main event: A glowing object was observed in Grand Ledge, Michigan on 8 June 1964, reported by multiple witnesses.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing two glowing objects for approximately 75 seconds., The objects were described as glowing and emitting a humming sound., The sighting was initially attributed to a reflection of car headlights on fog., Subsequent interviews with other witnesses confirmed similar observations of unidentified lights., The local sheriff and a doctor also witnessed the event, noting the object's size and behavior.
witness description: Individuals included local residents and law enforcement, with observations supporting the report of a bright light.
